doc.field: This series consists of objects and props from Mabou Mines productions. Of particular interest are the puppets Rose [ Shaggy Dog Animation] and John [ Prelude to Death in Venice], and the shadow puppets from the MahabharANTa.

The shadow puppets 133.2.0023 through 133.2.0053 were made for MahabharANTa, written by Lee Breuer and performed in 1992 in the United States. Larry Reed facilitated the collaboration between Lee Breuer and Balinese shadow master (dalang), I Wayan Wija. Wija made the rawhide puppets in 1992 in Bali. In an interview, he said he made all the puppets, except the wooden handles, which were custom-made by local artisans. Shadow puppets made of paper and found materials were not created by I Wayan Wija.
Source: Wija, I Wayan. 2023. Interview by Peiyuan Sun and Jessica Pace. WhatsApp. February 13, 2023.
